name: Will-o\'-Wisp
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.Consume Life: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.
traits.Ephemeral: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.
traits.Incorporeal Movement: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
traits.Variable Illumination: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.
